This module implements steps.

Imports

cell, common, fqdn, pair, placement, ../private/arrayutils, ../private/assign, ../private/deques, ../private/math, ../private/results2, ../private/strutils, ../private/tables

Types

Step = object
  case kind*: StepKind
  of PairPlacement:
    pair*: Pair
    optPlacement*: OptPlacement
  of Garbages:
    counts*: array[Col, int]
    dropHard*: bool
  of Rotate:
    cross*: bool
Game step. 
StepKind {.pure.} = enum
  PairPlacement, Garbages, Rotate
Discriminator for Step. 
Steps = Deque[Step]
Sequence of steps.
